Michael Frank is a member of this group and has always been willing to assi=
st anyone who asks. =C2=A0As far as the effectiveness of the Frank's Box, t=
he owners of the box, including myself would tell you they are the best, as=
 well as some of the radios the members have hacked. Both Steve and Frank h=
ave been involved in ITC for many years, =C2=A0The evolution of the Spirit =
Box, in my opinion, is in it.s infancy!

      <p>New to ghost hunting.  I have actua=

 EVP's and it's just insane when you first hear them.   I came across some =

ather build my own from scratch.   Just curious though.  Any help would be =
appreciated. <br>
